Define Documentation

#define PW13_CLASSPATH_H_INCLUDED   1
 

Function Documentation

PW13_EXPORT int pw13_classpath_of_filepath (  char *  path  ) 
 

Transforms classpath corresponding to a given file path.

It returns 0 if the path is valid and was transformed into a classpath.

PW13_EXPORT pw13_patch_class pw13_find_classpath (  pw13_patchwork  pw,
const char *  path
) 
 

Find a patch class in a patchwork from its class path.

PW13_EXPORT pw13_patch_class pw13_load_classpath (  pw13_patchwork  pw,
const char *  path
) 
 

Load a patch class from its class path (eg "std/float/pi").

PW13_EXPORT pw13_patch pw13_patch_of_classpath (  pw13_patchwork  pw,
const char *  classpath,
const char *  name
) 
 

Returns a patch of the given class path, and adds it to the patchwork.

The patch class is registered with the patchwork.

PW13_EXPORT pw13_patch_class pw13_register_classpath (  pw13_patchwork  pw,
const char *  classpath
) 
 

Register or return registered patch class from its path.
